execution_plan.description: Find customer_ids of customers that have at least 2 distinct payment methods.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id FROM customer_payment_methods GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT payment_method_code) >= 2;

execution_plan.description: Get orders (order_id and order date) placed by the customers identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, date_order_placed, customer_id FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
